pageProduct.name: Palmers Coconut Oil Deep Conditioning Protein Pack 60g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer’s® Coconut Oil Formula® Deep Conditioning Protein Pack is an intensive moisturising treatment to strengthen and repair dry, damaged hair.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Containing ethically and sustainably sourced Coconut Oil and  Tahitian Monoi, infused with Tiaré flower petals, these natural ingredients help strengthen, deeply hydrate, repair damage and give hair incredible shine. Other key ingredients include Keratin Protein, Silk Protein and Coconut Milk.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Stearyl Alcohol, Cyclopentasiloxane, PEG-40 Stearate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Cetyl Alcohol, Cyclohexasiloxane, Behenyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Gardenia Tahitensis Flower Extract, Nonfat Dry Milk (Sine Adipe Lac), Hydrolyzed Silk, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate,  Stearalkonium Chloride, Pentylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Decylene Glycol, 1.2-Hexanediol, Sodium Acetate, Cellulose, Quaternium-26, Myristyl Alcohol, Hydroxyethyl Cetearamidopropyldimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Dimethyl Stearamine, Fragrance (Parfum), Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Pentylene Glycol, Isopropyl Alcohol, Lauryl Alcohol.

Directions

After shampooing with Palmer's Coconut Oil Formula Nourishing Shampoo, distribute through hair, coating strands evenly and focusing on ends. Leave it in for 10-20 minutes before rinsing or if using as an overnight treatment, cover hair with a plastic cap or covering and rinse out in the morning.
